Dull_Pain.help: You activate special programming within your armor that temporarily boosts your maximum hit points.
Dull_Pain.targetHelp: Your maximum hit points have been increased.

Resistance.help: You are resistant to smashing, lethal and cold damage, but are vulnerable to energy damage.
Resistance.targetHelp: You are resistant to smashing, lethal and cold damage, but are vulnerable to energy damage.

Sawblade.help: You throw sawblades with great force due to your cybernetic enhancements. This sawblade strikes a distant target, causing an initial burst of lethal damage and lethal damage over time. The target also suffers reduced regeneration and recovery. There is also a small chance the target will be knocked back.
Sawblade.shortHelp: Ranged, Minor DMG (Lethal), Minor DoT (Lethal), -Regen (Foe), -Rec (Foe), Chance for Knockback (Foe)
Sawblade.targetHelp: You are suffering lethal damage over time. Additionally, your regeneration and recovery have been reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Cybernetic_Hammers.help: You smash a single target with one of your cybernetic hammers. This causes smashing damage and reduces the target's defenses. There is also a chance that the target may be stunned.
Cybernetic_Hammers.shortHelp: Melee, High DMG (Smashing), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Stun (Foe)
Cybernetic_Hammers.targetHelp: Your defenses have been reduced and you may be stunned.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Hammer_Clap.help: You crash both of your cybernetic hammers together with tremendous force, creating a shockwave that causes smashing damage to all foes around you. Affected targets may also be knocked back and stunned.
Hammer_Clap.shortHelp: PBAoE, High DMG (Smashing), Chance for Stun (Foe), Knockback (Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Tank_Grenade.help: You launch a fragmentation grenade at long range from your armor's backpack. This explodes on impact, throwing shrapnel that causes smashing and lethal damage. There is also a high chance that the concussive effect from the explosion will knock affected targets back.
Tank_Grenade.shortHelp: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Superior DMG (Lethal/Smashing), Chance for Knockback (Foe)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
